data.title: Gold, Diamond, Platinum record Plaques
data.meta_description: The AWARD Group is an RIAA licensed, custom designer and manufacturer of certified gold, platinum and diamond plaques. Our studio produces the highest quality of framed plaques in the fastest turnaround time and within any budget.
data.text:
Get Custom RIAA Awards & Plaques

When it comes to creating custom gold, platinum and diamond plaques, The Recording Industry Association of America doesn’t just trust any company to produce such important awards. The Award Group is one of only four companies entrusted with this task! At The Award Group, we take pride in creating custom RIAA awards and custom RIAA plaques. Our RIAA award designer takes the utmost care in crafting a one of a kind award or plaque for each and every artist. Not every artist or group who releases a record will achieve such a monumental accomplishment. Your hard work, success and creativity deserves to be recognized with custom RIAA awards and custom RIAA plaques. Our RIAA award designer will immortalize your success in a beautiful award or plaque that you can showcase for years to come. Every custom RIAA award we get to create is an honor we don’t take lightly. Contact The Award Group today and learn more about our custom RIAA awards and custom RIAA plaques!
